ygData.msgSnippet: -- Pacifix -- Pacifix listens to Daemos comm, Alright, I m heading right over. He turns and pauses,  he thinks to himself,

-- Pacifix --

Pacifix listens to Daemos' comm, "Alright, I'm heading right over." 

He turns and pauses, <Here we go,> he thinks to himself, <I'm 
interested to see what has happened to Fire Drill... but, but i've 
also got a bad feeling about it...>. Shrugging, he walks towards the 
base of the obelisk, terrain crunching under his weighted foot 
steps. 

As he arrives, he spots Tankor, "Hello Tankor, let's go."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Daemos finally turns around, nodding to Anachronox.
> 
> Daemos: Yes, thank you. (he switches channel to join Pacifix) Go 
to 
> the base of the obelisk forming the Shadow Destiny. I will send 
Tankor 
> there, and he will wait for you there. Daemos out. (changes 
channel) 
> Tankor, please go meet Pacifix at the entrance, please.
> 
> Tankor goes to the entrance and waits there.
